Not waiting, the Trpredacus leader takes the pain reliefs out of
Darkangel's hands and injects them just beside the wound. Dreadplague
heavy twitching stops a few nanocycles after.

Tyrael: Good. That will make it easier. Prometheus, is Epimetheus in CR?

He takes one of the support circuits and peels off the sterilization
plastic strip on its back, then sticks it along Dread's spine.

Tyrael: Now, Darkangel, put two more circuits on her; one on her
spine, the other on her forehead. They will at least keep her
stabilized for them moment.

: : Darkangel : : 

He rushes off, looking through the lab for what is need. He eventually
returns with what was asked for. 

Darkangel: Here it is... 

 Azure The Warrior <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote: 

Tyrael touched the harpoon but a gasp from the female made him take
his hands off.

Tyrael: Not genetically speaking, but she considers me as her father
because I created her. Please go get some pain reliefs and a life
support circuit system.

He placed Dread better on the table, lying her on her back and
installing her head on a damage control pad.

Tyrael: Destructor, Prometheus, take Kaiser and Epimetheus to the CR.



>From: Richard Allen 
>To: Nic 
>Subject: Re: Fwd: Return to the base (Prometheus) 
>Date: Wed, 5 Mar 2003 17:10:36 -0800 (PST) 
> 
> 
>: : Darkangel : : 
>Darkangel: I see. This planet is full of warriors. Actually we have a
new member who I brought in. He is waiting in his quarters. 
>Darkangel seemed a little nervous to ask his next question. 
>Darkangel: I hope Dreadplague is ok. If you dont mind, is she really
your daughter? 
> Nic wrote: OOC: I just changed my email address for Yahoogroups.
It's now 
>Proudwing500k@... 
> 
>Bic: 
> 
>Tyrael looked at him while examining Dread's wound. 
> 
>Tyrael: We ran in the Rogues. Fierce warriors, but just a little bit 
>misguided and chaotic. (He turns to Prometheus) Can you tend to her or 
>can your brother do it? 
> 
>--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen wrote: 
> > 
> > : : Darkangel : : 
> > Darkangel meets up with the other bots. 
> > Darkangel: My god, what happened? I dont know much medical skills, 
>only the basics taught in millitary schools. 
> > Azure The Warrior wrote:From: "Azure The 
>Warrior" 
> > To: roborick007@y... 
> > Subject: Return to the base 
> > Date: Wed, 05 Mar 2003 01:33:53 +0000 
> > 
> > OOC: Hey Robo, it seems like Yahoogroups doesn't want me to post. 
>Could you transfer this to the group? Thanx! Bic: Tyrael landed in the 
>small hatch on the side of the Tripredacus Warship and went straight 
>to the CR chambers and the medbay. Tyrael: Prometheus, Destructor, 
>please follow me. We'll get them to CR then plan our next moves. (He 
>opened a comm with Darkangel) Darkangel, are you trained in any form 
>of medical interventions? He enters the room and places Dreadplague's 
>pain-twisted body on a table. He was worried by the harpoon still 
>deeply anchored in her body and did not dare to remove it. He knew it 
>had to be out before she went in a CR or she would have disastrous 
>side effects after. Tyrael: Do any of you know something in medical 
>interventions?
